Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.event

Class Theater

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.event.Event
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.event.Theater
public class Theater extends Event
This class extends the Event and represents a Theater event. A Theater event is created by a Manager
